properties.name: align-content
properties.description: CSS 的 align-content 属性用于设置交叉轴方向多个行或列的分布方式

values.name: center
values.description: 所有行朝向容器的中心填充。每行互相紧挨，相对于容器居中对齐。容器的垂直轴起点边和第一行的距离相等于容器的垂直轴终点边和最后一行的距离。

values.name: flex-start
values.description: 所有行从垂直轴起点开始填充。第一行的垂直轴起点边和容器的垂直轴起点边对齐。接下来的每一行紧跟前一行。

values.name: flex-end
values.description: 所有行从垂直轴末尾开始填充。最后一行的垂直轴终点和容器的垂直轴终点对齐。同时所有后续行与前一个对齐。

values.name: space-between
values.description: 所有行在容器中平均分布。相邻两行间距相等。容器的垂直轴起点边和终点边分别与第一行和最后一行的边对齐。

values.name: space-around
values.description: 所有行在容器中平均分布，相邻两行间距相等。容器的垂直轴起点边和终点边分别与第一行和最后一行的距离是相邻两行间距的一半。

values.name: stretch
values.description: 拉伸所有行来填满剩余空间。剩余空间平均地分配给每一行。

values.name: start
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other against the start edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.

values.name: end
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other against the end edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.

values.name: normal
values.description: The items are packed in their default position as if no align-content value was set.

values.name: baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
    
      
    
    The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

values.name: first baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
    
      
    
    The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

values.name: last baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
    
      
    
    The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

values.name: space-evenly
values.description: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the cross axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the start edge and the first item, and the end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.

values.name: safe
values.description: Used alongside an alignment keyword. If the chosen keyword means that the item overflows the alignment container causing data loss, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.

values.name: unsafe
values.description: Used alongside an alignment keyword. Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container and whether overflow which causes data loss might happen, the given alignment value is honored.

values.name: baseline first baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

properties.name: align-items

values.name: center
values.description: 元素在侧轴居中。如果元素在侧轴上的高度高于其容器，那么在两个方向上溢出距离相同。

values.name: flex-start
values.description: 元素向侧轴起点对齐。

values.name: flex-end
values.description: 元素向侧轴终点对齐。

values.name: stretch
values.description: 弹性项包含外边距的交叉轴尺寸被拉升至行高

values.name: baseline
values.description: 所有元素向基线对齐。侧轴起点到元素基线距离最大的元素将会于侧轴起点对齐以确定基线。

values.name: normal
values.description:
The effect of this keyword is dependent of the layout mode we are in:
    
      In absolutely-positioned layouts, the keyword behaves like start on replaced absolutely-positioned boxes, and as stretch on all other absolutely-positioned boxes.
      In static position of absolutely-positioned layouts, the keyword behaves as stretch.
      For flex items, the keyword behaves as stretch.
      For grid items, this keyword leads to a behavior similar to the one of stretch, except for boxes with an aspect ratio or an intrinsic sizes where it behaves like start.
      The property doesn't apply to block-level boxes, and to table cells.

values.name: start
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.

values.name: end
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.

values.name: self-start
values.description: The items are packed flush to the edge of the alignment container's start side of the item, in the appropriate axis.

values.name: self-end
values.description: The items are packed flush to the edge of the alignment container's end side of the item, in the appropriate axis.

values.name: first baseline
values.description: All flex items are aligned such that their flex container baselines align. The item with the largest distance between its cross-start margin edge and its baseline is flushed with the cross-start edge of the line.

values.name: last baseline
values.description: All flex items are aligned such that their flex container baselines align. The item with the largest distance between its cross-start margin edge and its baseline is flushed with the cross-start edge of the line.

values.name: safe
values.description: Used alongside an alignment keyword. If the chosen keyword means that the item overflows the alignment container causing data loss, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.

values.name: unsafe
values.description: Used alongside an alignment keyword. Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container and whether overflow which causes data loss might happen, the given alignment value is honored.

values.name: left
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the left edge of the alignment container. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.

values.name: right
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the right edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.

properties.description: CSS align-items 属性将所有直接子节点上的 align-self 值设置为一个组。align-self 属性设置项目在其包含块中在交叉轴方向上的对齐方式。

properties.name: align-self

values.name: auto
values.description: 设置为父元素的 align-items 值。

values.name: center
values.description: flex 元素会对齐到 cross-axis 的中间，如果该元素的 cross-size 尺寸大于 flex 容器，将在两个方向均等溢出。

values.name: flex-start
values.description: flex 元素会对齐到 cross-axis 的首端。

values.name: flex-end
values.description: flex 元素会对齐到 cross-axis 的尾端。

values.name: stretch
values.description: If the cross size property of the flex item computes to auto, and neither of the cross-axis margins are auto, the flex item is stretched.

values.name: baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
      flex 元素将会基于容器的宽和高，按照自身 margin box 的 cross-size 拉伸。If the combined size of the items along the cross axis is less than the size of the alignment container and the item is auto-sized, its size is increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size of all auto-sized items exactly fills the alignment container along the cross axis.

values.name: normal
values.description:
The effect of this keyword is dependent of the layout mode we are in:
    
      In absolutely-positioned layouts, the keyword behaves like start on replaced absolutely-positioned boxes, and as stretch on all other absolutely-positioned boxes.
      In static position of absolutely-positioned layouts, the keyword behaves as stretch.
      For flex items, the keyword behaves as stretch.
      For grid items, this keyword leads to a behavior similar to the one of stretch, except for boxes with an aspect ratio or an intrinsic sizes where it behaves like start.
      The property doesn't apply to block-level boxes, and to table cells.

values.name: self-end
values.description: Aligns the items to be flush with the edge of the alignment container corresponding to the item's end side in the cross axis.

values.name: self-start
values.description: Aligns the items to be flush with the edge of the alignment container corresponding to the item's start side in the cross axis.

values.name: first baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

values.name: last baseline
values.description:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

values.name: safe
values.description: If the size of the item overflows the alignment container, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.

values.name: unsafe
values.description: Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container, the given alignment value is honored.

properties.description: CSS 属性 align-self 会对齐当前 grid 或 flex 行中的元素，并覆盖已有的 align-items 的值。In Grid, it aligns the item inside the grid area. 在 Flexbox 中，会按照 cross axis（当前 flex 元素排列方向的垂直方向）进行排列。

properties.name: background

values.name: fixed
values.description: The background is fixed with regard to the viewport. In paged media where there is no viewport, a 'fixed' background is fixed with respect to the page box and therefore replicated on every page.

values.name: local
values.description: The background is fixed with regard to the element's contents: if the element has a scrolling mechanism, the background scrolls with the element's contents.

values.name: none
values.description: A value of 'none' counts as an image layer but draws nothing.

values.name: scroll
values.description: The background is fixed with regard to the element itself and does not scroll with its contents. (It is effectively attached to the element's border.)

properties.description: background 是一种 CSS 简写属性，用于一次性集中定义各种背景属性，包括 color, image, origin 与 size, repeat 方式等等。

properties.name: background-clip

values.name: border-box
values.description: 背景延伸至边框外沿（但是在边框下层）。

values.name: padding-box
values.description: 背景延伸至内边距（padding）外沿。不会绘制到边框处。

values.name: content-box
values.description: 背景被裁剪至内容区（content box）外沿。

values.name: text
values.description: The background is painted within (clipped to) the foreground text.

properties.description: background-clip 设置元素的背景（背景图片或颜色）是否延伸到边框、内边距盒子、内容盒子下面。

properties.name: background-color
properties.description: CSS属性中的 background-color 会设置元素的背景色，属性的值为颜色值或关键字"transparent"二者选其一。

properties.name: background-image

values.name: linear-gradient
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: none
values.description: Is a keyword denoting the absence of images.

properties.description: CSS background-image 属性用于为一个元素设置一个或者多个背景图像。

properties.name: border
properties.description: CSS 的 border 是设置元素边框属性的简写形式，用于设置一个或多个以下属性的值：border-width、border-style、border-color。

properties.name: border-bottom
properties.description: border-bottom 简写属性把下边框的所有属性：border-bottom-color，border-bottom-style 与 border-bottom-width 设置到了一个声明中。这些属性描述了元素的下边框样式。

properties.name: border-bottom-color
properties.description: border-bottom-color 属性设置一个元素底部边框的颜色。应当指出，在多数情况下，CSS 简写属性 border-color 或 border-bottom 更方便实用。

values.name: inherit
values.description: 一个代表父元素底边颜色的关键字（可能和 border-bottom-color 默认值不同）

properties.name: border-bottom-left-radius
properties.description: border-bottom-left-radius 这个 css 属性设置元素左下角的圆角。圆角可以是圆或椭圆（注：应为圆或椭圆的一部分），或者当其中一个值为 0 时，圆角将不被设置，这时这个角将展示为直角。

properties.name: border-bottom-right-radius
properties.description: The border-bottom-right-radius CSS property rounds the bottom-right corner of an element by specifying the radius (or the radius of the semi-major and semi-minor axes) of the ellipse defining the curvature of the corner.

properties.name: border-bottom-style

values.name: none
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: solid
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dashed
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dotted
values.description: No description on MDN

properties.description: The border-bottom-style CSS property sets the line style of an element's bottom border.

properties.name: border-bottom-width

values.name: thin
values.description: 细边线

values.name: medium
values.description: 中等边线

values.name: thick
values.description: 宽边线

properties.description: CSS 属性 border-bottom-width 设置一个元素的底部边框宽度。

properties.name: border-color

values.name: color
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示四个边框的颜色，仅用于单值语法。

values.name: horizontal
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示水平（左边框和右边框）边框的颜色，仅用于双值语法。

values.name: vertical
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示垂直（上边框和下边框）边框的颜色，仅用于双值或三值语法。

values.name: top
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示上边框的颜色，仅用于三值或四值语法。

values.name: bottom
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示下边框的颜色，仅用于三值或四值语法。

values.name: right
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示右边框的颜色，仅用于四值语法。

values.name: left
values.description: 使用 <color> 来表示左边框的颜色，仅用于四值语法。

values.name: inherit
values.description: 这是一个关键词，用于指示四边的颜色值均继承自父元素的计算值。

properties.description: CSS 属性 border-color 是一个用于设置元素四个边框颜色的快捷属性： border-top-color、border-right-color、border-bottom-color、border-left-color。

properties.name: border-left
properties.description: CSS 属性 border-left 是属性border-left-color, border-left-style, 和border-left-width的三者的缩写。这些属性都是在描述一个元素的左边的边框border。

properties.name: border-left-color
properties.description: border-left-color 属性设置元素的左边框颜色。值得注意的是，在大数情况下使用 border-color 或 border-left 更加方便和普遍。

properties.name: border-left-style

values.name: none
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: solid
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dashed
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dotted
values.description: No description on MDN

properties.description: The border-left-style CSS property sets the line style of an element's left border.

properties.name: border-left-width

values.name: thin
values.description: 细边线

values.name: medium
values.description: 中等边线

values.name: thick
values.description: 宽边线

properties.description: CSS 的 border-left-width 属性用来设置盒子的左边框的宽度。

properties.name: border-radius
properties.description: CSS 属性 border-radius 允许你设置元素的外边框圆角。当使用一个半径时确定一个圆形，当使用两个半径时确定一个椭圆。这个（椭）圆与边框的交集形成圆角效果。

properties.name: border-right
properties.description: CSS 属性 border-right 是属性border-right-color, border-right-style, 和border-right-width的三者的缩写。这些属性都是在描述一个元素的右边的边框border。

properties.name: border-right-color
properties.description: border-right-color CSS 属性用来设置元素右边的 border. 这个属性的值也可以通过简写的 CSS 属性 border-color 或border-right来设置。

properties.name: border-right-style

values.name: none
values.description: No description on MDN

values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dashed
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dotted
values.description: No description on MDN

properties.description: border-right-style 是 border 中的一个 CSS 子属性，描述的是右边框的样式 border.

properties.name: border-right-width

values.name: thin
values.description: 细边线

values.name: medium
values.description: 中等边线

values.name: thick
values.description: 宽边线

properties.description: CSS 的**border-right-width** 用来设置盒子右边框的宽度。

properties.name: border-style

values.name: none
values.description: Like the hidden keyword, displays no border. Unless a background-image is set, the computed value of the same side's border-width will be 0, even if the specified value is something else. In the case of table cell and border collapsing, the none value has the lowest priority: if any other conflicting border is set, it will be displayed.

values.name: solid
values.description: Displays a single, straight, solid line.

values.name: dashed
values.description: Displays a series of short square-ended dashes or line segments. The exact size and length of the segments are not defined by the specification and are implementation-specific.

values.name: dotted
values.description: Displays a series of rounded dots. The spacing of the dots is not defined by the specification and is implementation-specific. The radius of the dots is half the computed value of the same side's border-width.

values.name: hidden
values.description: Like the none keyword, displays no border. Unless a background-image is set, the computed value of the same side's border-width will be 0, even if the specified value is something else. In the case of table cell and border collapsing, the hidden value has the highest priority: if any other conflicting border is set, it won't be displayed.

values.name: double
values.description: Displays two straight lines that add up to the pixel size defined by border-width.

values.name: groove
values.description: Displays a border with a carved appearance. It is the opposite of ridge.

values.name: ridge
values.description: Displays a border with an extruded appearance. It is the opposite of groove.

values.name: inset
values.description: Displays a border that makes the element appear embedded. It is the opposite of outset. When applied to a table cell with border-collapse set to collapsed, this value behaves like ridge.

values.name: outset
values.description: Displays a border that makes the element appear embossed. It is the opposite of inset. When applied to a table cell with border-collapse set to collapsed, this value behaves like groove.

properties.description: border-style 是一个 CSS 简写属性，用来设定元素所有边框的样式。

properties.name: border-top
properties.description: CSS 属性 border-top是属性 border-top-color, border-top-style, 和border-top-width 的三者的缩写。这些属性都是在描述一个元素的上方的边框border。

properties.name: border-top-color
properties.description: border-top-color 属性用以设置某元素顶部 border的颜色。通常，用border-color 或 border-top 设置该颜色更为便捷可取。

properties.name: border-top-left-radius
properties.description: border-top-left-radius 用来设置元素左上角的圆角效果。这段圆弧（角）可以是圆或椭圆的一部分。如果其中有一个值为 0，那么将无圆角效果（见 border-top-left-radius 取值方式)。

properties.name: border-top-right-radius
properties.description: border-top-right-radius 属性设置元素的右上角弧形，这个圆弧可能是一个椭圆，或者其中一个值是 0 的话，就是没有圆弧，换句话就是说拐角是方形的。

properties.name: border-top-style

values.name: none
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: solid
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dashed
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: dotted
values.description: No description on MDN

properties.description: border-top-style CSS 设置元素上边框的 border.

properties.name: border-top-width

values.name: thin
values.description: 细边线

values.name: medium
values.description: 中等边线

values.name: thick
values.description: 宽边线

properties.description: css 属性 border-top-width 是用于设置盒模型的上边框的宽度

properties.name: border-width

values.name: thin
values.description: 细边线

values.name: medium
values.description: 中等边线

values.name: thick
values.description: 宽边线

properties.description: border-width 属性可以设置盒子模型的边框宽度。

properties.name: bottom

values.name: auto
values.description: For non-replaced elements, the effect of this value depends on which of related properties have the value 'auto' as well

values.name: inherit
values.description: Specifies that the value is the same as the computed value from its parent element (which might not be its containing block). This computed value is then handled as if it were a <length>, <percentage>, or the auto keyword.

properties.description: bottom样式属性定义了定位元素下外边距边界与其包含块下边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。

properties.name: box-shadow

values.name: inset
values.description:
如果没有指定inset，默认阴影在边框外，即阴影向外扩散。
      使用 inset 关键字会使得阴影落在盒子内部，这样看起来就像是内容被压低了。此时阴影会在边框之内 (即使是透明边框）、背景之上、内容之下。

values.name: none
values.description: No shadow.

properties.description: CSS box-shadow 属性用于在元素的框架上添加阴影效果。你可以在同一个元素上设置多个阴影效果，并用逗号将他们分隔开。该属性可设置的值包括阴影的 X 轴偏移量、Y 轴偏移量、模糊半径、扩散半径和颜色。

properties.name: box-sizing

values.name: content-box
values.description:
默认值，标准盒子模型。width 与 height 只包括内容的宽和高，不包括边框（border），内边距（padding），外边距（margin）。注意：内边距、边框和外边距都在这个盒子的外部。比如说，.box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} 在浏览器中的渲染的实际宽度将是 370px。
    尺寸计算公式：
    
      width = 内容的宽度
      height = 内容的高度
    
    宽度和高度的计算值都不包含内容的边框（border）和内边距（padding）。

values.name: border-box
values.description:
width 和 height 属性包括内容，内边距和边框，但不包括外边距。这是当文档处于 Quirks 模式 时 Internet Explorer 使用的盒模型。注意，填充和边框将在盒子内 , 例如， .box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} 导致在浏览器中呈现的宽度为 350px 的盒子。内容框不能为负，并且被分配到 0，使得不可能使用 border-box 使元素消失。
    尺寸计算公式：
    
      width = border + padding + 内容的宽度
      height = border + padding + 内容的高度

properties.description: CSS 中的 box-sizing 属性定义了 user agent 应该如何计算一个元素的总宽度和总高度。

properties.name: color
properties.description: color CSS 属性设置文本及文本装饰（text-decoration）的前景色颜色值。

values.name: currentcolor
values.description: 将颜色设置为元素的 color 属性值。但是，如果设置为 color 的值，currentcolor 将被视为 inherit。

properties.name: display
properties.description: CSS display 属性设置元素的布局方式，默认值为flex（弹性布局）。

values.name: flex
values.description: 该元素的行为类似块级元素并且根据弹性盒模型布局它的内容。

values.name: none
values.description: 使元素不再显示，其对布局不会有影响（文档渲染得好像这个元素并不存在）。所有的后代元素也不会再显示。为了使元素占据一个它通常占据的空间，但实际上没有渲染任何东西，应该使用 visibility 属性。

values.name: block
values.description: The element generates a block-level box

values.name: contents
values.description: The element itself does not generate any boxes, but its children and pseudo-elements still generate boxes as normal.

values.name: flexbox
values.description: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout). Standardized as 'flex'.

values.name: flow-root
values.description: The element generates a block container box, and lays out its contents using flow layout.

values.name: grid
values.description: The element generates a principal grid container box, and establishes a grid formatting context.

values.name: inline
values.description: The element generates an inline-level box.

values.name: inline-block
values.description: A block box, which itself is flowed as a single inline box, similar to a replaced element. The inside of an inline-block is formatted as a block box, and the box itself is formatted as an inline box.

values.name: inline-flex
values.description: Inline-level flex container.

values.name: inline-flexbox
values.description: Inline-level flex container. Standardized as 'inline-flex'

values.name: inline-table
values.description: Inline-level table wrapper box containing table box.

values.name: list-item
values.description: One or more block boxes and one marker box.

values.name: -moz-box
values.description: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout). Standardized as 'flex'.

values.description: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout). Standardized as 'flex'.

values.description: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout).

values.name: -webkit-inline-box
values.description: Inline-level flex container. Standardized as 'inline-flex'

values.name: -webkit-inline-flex
values.description: Inline-level flex container.

values.name: flow
values.description:
该元素使用流式布局（块和内联布局）来排布它的内容。
        如果它的外部显示类型是 inline 或 run-in，并且它参与一个块或者内联格式上下文，那么它将生成一个内联盒子。否则它将生成一个块容器盒。
        根据其他属性的值（例如 position、float 或 overflow）以及它自身是否参与到块或者内联格式化上下文，它要么为它的内容建立新的块级格式化上下文（BFC），要么将其内容集成到其父元素的格式化上下文中。

values.name: inline-grid
values.description:
元素的行为类似于内联元素并且它的内容根据网格盒模型布局。
        它等同于 inline grid。

properties.name: flex

values.name: initial
values.description: 元素会根据自身宽高设置尺寸。它会缩短自身以适应 flex 容器，但不会伸长并吸收 flex 容器中的额外自由空间来适应 flex 容器。相当于将属性设置为"flex: 0 1 auto"。

values.name: auto
values.description: 元素会根据自身的宽度与高度来确定尺寸，但是会伸长并吸收 flex 容器中额外的自由空间，也会缩短自身来适应 flex 容器。这相当于将属性设置为 "flex: 1 1 auto".

values.name: none
values.description: 元素会根据自身宽高来设置尺寸。它是完全非弹性的：既不会缩短，也不会伸长来适应 flex 容器。相当于将属性设置为"flex: 0 0 auto"。

values.name: content
values.description: Indicates automatic sizing, based on the flex item's content.

properties.description: flex CSS 简写属性设置了弹性项目如何增大或缩小以适应其弹性容器中可用的空间。

properties.name: flex-basis

values.name: auto
values.description: Retrieves the value of the main size property as the used 'flex-basis'.

values.name: content
values.description:
基于 flex 的元素的内容自动调整大小。
    
      **备注：**由于最初规范中没有包括这个值，在一些早期的浏览器实现的 flex 布局中，content 值无效，可以利用设置 (width 或 height) 为 auto 达到同样的效果。
    
    
      备注： 简史
      
        最初，"flex-basis:auto" 的含义是 "参照我的width和height属性".
        在此之后，"flex-basis:auto" 的含义变成了自动尺寸，而 "main-size" 变成了 "参照我的width和height属性"。实际执行于 bug 1032922.
        然后呢，这个更改又在 bug 1093316 中被撤销了，所以 "auto" 变回了原来的含义; 而一个新的关键字 'content' 变成了自动尺寸。 (Firefox bug 1105111 包括了增加这个关键字).

properties.description: CSS 属性 flex-basis 指定了 flex 元素在主轴方向上的初始大小。如果不使用 box-sizing 改变盒模型的话，那么这个属性就决定了 flex 元素的内容盒（content-box）的尺寸。

properties.name: flex-direction

values.name: row
values.description: flex 容器的主轴被定义为与文本方向相同。主轴起点和主轴终点与内容方向相同。

values.name: row-reverse
values.description: 表现和 row 相同，但是置换了主轴起点和主轴终点

values.name: column
values.description: flex 容器的主轴和块轴相同。主轴起点与主轴终点和书写模式的前后点相同

values.name: column-reverse
values.description: 表现和column相同，但是置换了主轴起点和主轴终点

properties.description: CSS flex-direction 属性指定了内部元素是如何在 flex 容器中布局的，定义了主轴的方向 (正方向或反方向)。

properties.name: flex-flow

values.name: column
values.description: The flex container's main axis has the same orientation as the block axis of the current writing mode.

values.name: column-reverse
values.description: Same as 'column', except the main-start and main-end directions are swapped.

values.name: row
values.description: The flex container's main axis has the same orientation as the inline axis of the current writing mode.

values.name: row-reverse
values.description: Same as 'row', except the main-start and main-end directions are swapped.

values.name: nowrap
values.description: The flex container is single-line.

values.name: wrap
values.description: The flexbox is multi-line.

values.name: wrap-reverse
values.description: Same as 'wrap', except the cross-start and cross-end directions are swapped.

properties.description: CSS flex-flow 属性是 flex-direction 和 flex-wrap 的简写。

properties.name: flex-grow
properties.description: CSS 属性 flex-grow CSS 设置 flex 项 主尺寸 的 flex 增长系数。

properties.name: flex-shrink
properties.description: CSS flex-shrink 属性指定了 flex 元素的收缩规则。flex 元素仅在默认宽度之和大于容器的时候才会发生收缩，其收缩的大小是依据 flex-shrink 的值。

properties.name: flex-wrap

values.name: nowrap
values.description: flex 的元素被摆放到到一行，这可能导致 flex 容器溢出。cross-start 会根据 flex-direction 的值等价于 start 或 before。为该属性的默认值。

values.name: wrap
values.description: The flexbox is multi-line.

values.name: wrap-reverse
values.description: 和 wrap 的行为一样，但是 cross-start 和 cross-end 互换。

properties.description: CSS 的 flex-wrap 属性指定 flex 元素单行显示还是多行显示。如果允许换行，这个属性允许你控制行的堆叠方向。

properties.name: font-family

values.name: cursive
values.description:
草书字体。这种字体有的有连笔，有的还有特殊的斜体效果。因为一般这种字体都有一点连笔效果，所以会给人一种手写的感觉。
        例如：Brush Script MT、Brush Script Std、Lucida Calligraphy、Lucida Handwriting、Apple Chancery、cursive。

values.name: fantasy
values.description:
Fantasy 字体主要是那些具有特殊艺术效果的字体。
        例如：Papyrus、Herculanum、Party LET、Curlz MT、Harrington、fantasy。

values.name: monospace
values.description:
等宽字体，即字体中每个字宽度相同。
        例如：Fira Mono、DejaVu Sans Mono、Menlo、Consolas、Liberation Mono、Monaco、Lucida Console、monospace。

values.name: sans-serif
values.description:
无衬线字体，即笔画结尾是平滑的字体。
        例如：Open Sans、Fira Sans、Lucida Sans、Lucida Sans Unicode、Trebuchet MS、Liberation Sans、Nimbus Sans L、sans-serif。

values.name: serif
values.description:
带衬线字体，笔画结尾有特殊的装饰线或衬线。
        例如：Lucida Bright、Lucida Fax、Palatino、Palatino Linotype、Palladio、URW Palladio、serif。

values.name: system-ui
values.description: Glyphs are taken from the default user interface font on a given platform. Because typographic traditions vary widely across the world, this generic is provided for typefaces that don't map cleanly into the other generics.

values.name: ui-serif
values.description: The default user interface serif font.

values.name: ui-sans-serif
values.description: The default user interface sans-serif font.

values.name: ui-rounded

values.name: math
values.description: This is for the particular stylistic concerns of representing mathematics: superscript and subscript, brackets that cross several lines, nesting expressions, and double struck glyphs with distinct meanings.

values.name: emoji
values.description: Fonts that are specifically designed to render emoji.

values.name: fangsong
values.description: A particular style of Chinese characters that are between serif-style Song and cursive-style Kai forms. This style is often used for government documents.

properties.description: CSS 属性 font-family 允许你通过给定一个有先后顺序的，由字体名或者字体族名组成的列表来为选定的元素设置字体。

properties.name: font-size
properties.description: font-size CSS 属性设置字体大小。更改字体大小还会更新字体大小相关的 `<length>` 单位，例如 line-height 属性的 em 单位值。

values.name: large
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: larger
values.description: 相对大小关键字。字体大小将相对于父元素的字体大小变大或变小，大致按照上面用于区分绝对大小关键字的比率。

values.name: medium
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: small
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: smaller
values.description: 相对大小关键字。字体大小将相对于父元素的字体大小变大或变小，大致按照上面用于区分绝对大小关键字的比率。

values.name: x-large
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: x-small
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: xx-large
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: xx-small
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: xxx-large
values.description: 基于用户默认字体大小（medium）的绝对大小关键字。

values.name: math
values.description:
Scaling rules are applied when determining the computed value of the font-size property for math elements relative to the font-size of the containing parent.
      See the math-depth property for more information.

properties.name: font-style

values.name: italic
values.description: 选择斜体，如果当前字体没有可用的斜体版本，会选用倾斜体（oblique ）替代。

values.name: normal
values.description: 选择 font-family 的常规字体。

values.name: oblique
values.description:
Selects a font classified as oblique, and additionally specifies an angle for the slant of the text. If one or more oblique faces are available in the chosen font family, the one that most closely matches the specified angle is chosen. If no oblique faces are available, the browser will synthesize an oblique version of the font by slanting a normal face by the specified amount. Valid values are degree values of -90deg to 90deg inclusive. If an angle is not specified, an angle of 14 degrees is used. Positive values are slanted to the end of the line, while negative values are slanted towards the beginning.
    In general, for a requested angle of 14 degrees or greater, larger angles are preferred; otherwise, smaller angles are preferred (see the spec's font matching section for the precise algorithm).

properties.description: font-style CSS 属性允许你选择 font-family 字体下的 italic 或 oblique 样式。

properties.name: font-weight

values.name: normal
values.description: 正常粗细。与 400 等值。

values.name: bold
values.description: 加粗。与 700 等值。
Normal
Bold
Thin
Extra Light (Ultra Light)
Light
Medium
Semi Bold (Demi Bold)
Extra Bold (Ultra Bold)
Black (Heavy)

values.name: bolder
values.description: One relative font weight heavier than the parent element. Note that only four font weights are considered for relative weight calculation; see the Meaning of relative weights section below.

values.name: lighter
values.description: One relative font weight lighter than the parent element. Note that only four font weights are considered for relative weight calculation; see the Meaning of relative weights section below.

properties.description: font-weight CSS 属性指定了字体的粗细程度。一些字体只提供 normal 和 bold 两种值。

properties.name: height

values.name: auto
values.description: 由浏览器为元素计算并选择一个高度。

values.name: fit-content
values.description: 将 fill-content 公式中的可用位置替换为特定的参数以进行使用，如：min(max-content, max(min-content, ))

values.name: max-content
values.description: 设置为允许的最大高度。

values.name: min-content
values.description: 设置为允许的最小高度。

values.name: fit-content(<length-percentage>)
values.description: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, <length-percentage>))

values.name: clamp()
values.description: Enables selecting a middle value within a range of values between a defined minimum and maximum

values.name: border-box
values.description: 如果设置该值，则 <length> 或者 <percentage> 会设置为该元素的 border box。

values.name: content-box
values.description: 如果设置该值，则 <length> 或者 <percentage> 会设置为该元素的 content box。

values.name: fill
values.description: 根据文字方向，使用 fill-available 作为行大小或者块大小。

values.name: available
values.description: 包含块高度减去当前元素的边距，边框和填充。

properties.description: height CSS 属性指定了一个元素的高度。默认情况下，这个属性决定的是内容区（ content area）的高度，但是，如果将 box-sizing 设置为 border-box , 这个属性决定的将是边框区域（border area）的高度。

properties.name: justify-content

values.name: center
values.description: 元素紧密地排列在主轴方向居中对齐

values.name: flex-start
values.description: 元素紧密地排列在容器主轴起始侧

values.name: flex-end
values.description: 元素紧密地排列在容器主轴结束侧

values.name: space-between
values.description: 在主轴上均匀分配元素。相邻元素间距离相同。第一个元素与主轴首对齐，最后一个元素与主轴尾对齐

values.name: space-around
values.description: 元素沿着主轴均匀分布在容器中。相邻项之间的间距，主轴起始位置到第一个元素的间距，主轴结束位置到最后一个元素的间距，都完全一样

values.name: start
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the main axis.

values.name: end
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the main axis.

values.name: left
values.description: The items are packed flush with each other toward the left edge of the alignment container. When the property's horizontal axis is not parallel with the inline axis, such as when flex-direction: column; is set, this value behaves like start.

values.name: right
values.description: The items are packed flush to each other toward the right edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis. If the property's axis is not parallel with the inline axis (in a grid container) or the main-axis (in a flexbox container), this value behaves like start.

values.name: safe
values.description: If the item overflows the alignment container, then the item is aligned as if the alignment mode is start. The desired alignment will not be implemented.

values.name: unsafe
values.description: Even if the item overflows the alignment container, the desired alignment will be implemented. Unlike safe, which will ignore the desired alignment in favor of preventing overflow.

values.name: stretch
values.description:
If the combined size of the items along the main axis is less than the size of the alignment container, any auto-sized items have their size increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size exactly fills the alignment container along the main axis.
    
      Note: While stretch is supported by flexible boxes (flexbox), when applied on a flexbox, as stretching is controlled by flex, stretch behaves as start.

values.name: space-evenly
values.description: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.

values.name: baseline
values.description: Specifies participation in first-baseline alignment.

values.name: first baseline
values.description: Specifies participation in first-baseline alignment.

values.name: last baseline
values.description: Specifies participation in last-baseline alignment.

values.name: normal
values.description: Behaves as stretch, except in the case of multi-column containers with a non-auto column-width, in which case the columns take their specified column-width rather than stretching to fill the container. As stretch behaves as start in flex containers, normal also behaves as start.

properties.description: CSS justify-content 属性定义浏览器如何沿着弹性容器的主轴和网格容器的行向轴分配内容元素之间和周围的空间。

properties.name: left

values.name: auto
values.description:
这个关键字表示：
    
      对于绝对定位元素，元素将忽略此属性而以right属性为准，如果此时设置width: auto，将基于内容需要的宽度设置宽度；如果right也为auto的话，元素的水平位置就是它假如作为静态 (即 static) 元素时该在的位置。
      对于相对定位元素，元素相对正常位置的偏移量将基于right属性；如果right也为auto的话，元素将不会有偏移。

values.name: inherit
values.description: Specifies that the value is the same as the computed value from its parent element (which might not be its containing block). This computed value is then handled as if it were a <length>, <percentage>, or the auto keyword.

properties.description: CSS **left**属性定义了定位元素的左外边距边界与其包含块左边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。

properties.name: letter-spacing

values.name: normal
values.description: 此间距是按照当前字体的正常间距确定的。和 0 不同的是，normal 会让用户代理调整文字之间空间来对齐文字。

properties.description: CSS 的 letter-spacing 属性用于设置文本字符的间距表现。在渲染文本时添加到字符之间的自然间距中。letter-spacing 的正值会导致字符分布得更远，而 letter-spacing 的负值会使字符更接近。

properties.name: line-height

values.name: normal
values.description: 取决于用户代理。桌面浏览器（包括 Firefox）使用默认值，约为 1.2，这取决于元素的 font-family。

properties.description: line-height CSS 属性用于设置多行元素的空间量，如多行文本的间距。对于块级元素，它指定元素行盒（line boxes）的最小高度。对于非替代的 inline 元素，它用于计算行盒（line box）的高度。

properties.name: lines
properties.description: text 组件专有样式，设置文本组件最大行数

properties.name: margin

values.name: auto
values.description: 让浏览器自己选择一个合适的外边距。有时，在一些特殊情况下，该值可以使元素居中。

properties.description: margin 属性为给定元素设置所有四个（上下左右）方向的外边距属性。也就是 margin-top，margin-right，margin-bottom，和 margin-left 四个外边距属性设置的简写。

properties.name: margin-bottom
properties.description: margin-bottom 属性设置与元素相关联的盒子模型的下外边距。可以为负值

values.name: auto
values.description: 由浏览器自己选择一个合适的值。参见 margin。

properties.name: margin-left

values.name: auto
values.description:
auto 关键词表示在当前布局模式下，浏览器根据接收的左边距自动计算出外边距。如果有几组 margin-left 和 margin-right 设置为 auto，那么最后计算的空间分布，会根据 display，float，position 属性，自动生成以下几种情况：
    
      
        
          Value of display
          Value of float
          Value of position
          Computed value of auto
          Comment
        
      
      
        
          inline, inline-block, inline-table
          any
          static or relative
          0
          Inline layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          any
          static or relative
          0, 除非margin-left和 margin-right 同时都设置为 auto。这样的话，元素就被设置为基于父元素居中。
          Block layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          left or right
          static or relative
          0
          Block layout mode (floating element)
        
        
          any table-*, except table-caption
          any
          any
          0
          Internal table-* elements don't have margins, use border-spacing instead
        
        
          any, except flex, inline-flex, or table-*
          any
          fixed or absolute
          0, except if both margin-left and margin-right are set to auto. In this case, it is set to the value centering the border area inside the available width, if fixed.
          Absolutely positioned layout mode
        
        
          flex, inline-flex
          any
          any
          在水平方向上有空余空间的情况下，空余的空间会被平均分给水平方向上写有 margin-left:auto 属性的元素的外边距
          Flexbox layout mode

properties.description: margin-left 属性 设置与元素相关联的盒子模型的左外边距。这个值可以为负值。

properties.name: margin-right

values.name: auto
values.description:
auto 关键词表示在当前布局模式下，浏览器根据接收的左边距自动计算出外边距。如果有几组 margin-left 和 margin-right 设置为 auto，那么最后计算的空间分布，会根据 display，float，position 属性，自动生成以下几种情况：
    
      
        
          Value of display
          Value of float
          Value of position
          Computed value of auto
          Comment
        
      
      
        
          inline, inline-block, inline-table
          any
          static or relative
          0
          Inline layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          any
          static or relative
          0, except if both margin-left and margin-right are set to auto. In this case, it is set to the value centering the element inside its parent.
          Block layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          left or right
          static or relative
          0
          Block layout mode (floating element)
        
        
          any table-*, except table-caption
          any
          any
          0
          Internal table-* elements don't have margins, use border-spacing instead
        
        
          any, except flex, inline-flex, or table-*
          any
          fixed or absolute
          0, except if both margin-left and margin-right are set to auto. In this case, it is set to the value centering the border area inside the available width, if fixed.
          Absolutely positioned layout mode
        
        
          flex, inline-flex
          any
          any
          0, except if there is any positive horizontal free space. In this case, it is evenly distributed to all horizontal auto margins.
          Flexbox layout mode

properties.description: margin-right 属性 设置与元素相关联的盒子模型的右外边距。这个值可以为负值。

properties.name: margin-top

values.name: auto
values.description: 浏览器选择一个合适的值来使用。参见 margin。

properties.description: margin-top CSS 属性用于设置元素的顶部外边距外边距区域。正值使它离相邻元素更远，而负值使它更靠近相邻元素。

properties.name: max-height

values.name: fit-content
values.description: Use the fit-content inline size or fit-content block size, as appropriate to the writing mode.

values.name: max-content
values.description: The intrinsic preferred max-height.

values.name: min-content
values.description: The intrinsic minimum max-height.

values.name: auto
values.description: The browser will calculate and select a max-height for the specified element.

values.name: none
values.description: No limit on the size of the box.

values.name: fit-content(<length-percentage>)
values.description: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).

properties.description: CSS属性 max-height 设置元素的最大高度。它防止height属性的使用值（used value）大于 max-height 的指定值。

properties.name: max-width

values.name: fit-content
values.description: 与 max-content 等价。

values.name: max-content
values.description: The intrinsic preferred width.

values.name: min-content
values.description: The intrinsic minimum width.

values.name: auto
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: none
values.description: 元素未设置最大值

values.name: fit-content(<length-percentage>)
values.description: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).

values.name: fill-available
values.description: The containing block width minus horizontal margin, border, and padding. Some browsers implement an ancient name for this keyword, available.

properties.description: max-width 属性用来给元素设置最大宽度值。定义了 max-width 的元素会在达到 max-width 值之后避免进一步按照 width 属性设置变大。

properties.name: min-height

values.name: fit-content
values.description: Use the fit-content inline size or fit-content block size, as appropriate to the writing mode.

values.name: max-content
values.description: The intrinsic preferred min-height.

values.name: min-content
values.description: The intrinsic minimum min-height.

values.name: auto
values.description: 浏览器将通过计算为指定元素选择一个 min-height 值。

values.name: none
values.description: 不限制盒容器的尺寸。

values.name: fit-content(<length-percentage>)
values.description: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).

properties.description: CSS 属性 min-height 能够设置元素的最小高度。这样能够防止 height 属性的应用值小于 min-height 的值。

properties.name: min-width

values.name: fit-content
values.description: 等同于 min(max-content, max(min-content, fill-available).

values.name: max-content
values.description: 固有首选宽度。

values.name: min-content
values.description: 固有最小宽度

values.name: auto
values.description: 用于弹性元素的默认最小宽度。相比其他布局中以0为默认值，auto能为弹性布局指明更合理的默认表现。

values.name: none
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: fit-content(<length-percentage>)
values.description: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).

values.name: fill-available
values.description: 包含块的宽度减去水平 margin、border 和 padding。有些浏览器在实现时使用了该关键字的早期名字： available。

properties.description: min-width 属性为给定元素设置最小宽度。它可以阻止 width 属性的应用值小于 min-width 的值。

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: opacity 属性指定了一个元素的不透明度。换言之，opacity 属性指定了一个元素后面的背景的被覆盖程度。

properties.name: overflow

values.name: visible
values.description: 暂时仅view组件支持visible，其他组件支持不支持

values.name: hidden
values.description: 如果需要，内容将被裁减以适应边距（padding）盒。不提供滚动条，也不支持允许用户滚动（例如通过拖拽或者使用滚轮）。内容可以以编程的方式滚动（例如，通过设置 scrollLeft 等属性的值或 scrollTo() 方法）, 因此该元素仍然是一个滚动的容器。

values.name: scroll
values.description: 如果需要，内容将被裁减以适应边距（padding）盒。无论是否实际裁剪了任何内容，浏览器总是显示滚动条，以防止滚动条在内容改变时出现或者消失。打印机可能会打印溢出的内容。

values.name: auto
values.description: 取决于用户代理。如果内容适应边距（padding）盒，它看起来与 visible 相同，但是仍然建立了一个新的块级格式化上下文。如果内容溢出，则浏览器提供滚动条。

values.name: clip
values.description: 类似于 hidden，内容将以元素的边距（padding）盒进行裁剪。clip 和 hidden 之间的区别是 clip 关键字禁止所有滚动，包括以编程方式的滚动。该盒子不是一个滚动的容器，并且不会启动新的格式化上下文。如果你希望开启一个新的格式化上下文，你可以使用 display: flow-root 来这样做。

values.name: -moz-hidden-unscrollable
values.description: Same as the standardized 'clip', except doesn't establish a block formatting context.

values.name: overlay
values.description: 行为与 auto 相同，但是滚动条绘制在内容之上，而不是占据空间。

values.name: -moz-scrollbars-none
values.description: 请使用 overflow: hidden 代替。

values.name: -moz-scrollbars-horizontal
values.description: 请使用 overflow-x: scroll 和 overflow-y: hidden，或使用 overflow: scroll hidden 代替。

values.name: -moz-scrollbars-vertical
values.description: 请使用 overflow-x: hidden 和 overflow-y: scroll，或使用 overflow: hidden scroll 代替。

properties.description: overflow 是 CSS 的简写属性，其设置了元素溢出时所需的行为——即当元素的内容太大而无法适应它的块级格式化上下文时。

properties.name: padding
properties.description: padding CSS 简写属性控制元素所有四条边的内边距区域。

properties.name: padding-bottom
properties.description: CSS 属性 padding-bottom 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中下方的高度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。和外边距（margin）不同，内边距（padding）是不允许有负值的。内边距（padding）可以用四个值声明一个元素的四个方向的内边距（paddings），这是一种 CSS 缩写属性。

properties.name: padding-left
properties.description: CSS 属性 padding-left 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中左边的宽度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。

properties.name: padding-right
properties.description: CSS 属性 padding-right 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中右边的宽度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。和外边距（margin）不同，内边距（padding）是不允许有负值的。内边距（padding）可以用四个值声明一个元素的四个方向的内边距（paddings），这是一种 CSS 缩写属性。

properties.name: padding-top
properties.description: CSS 属性 padding-top 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中上方的高度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。和外边距（margin）不同，内边距（padding）是不允许有负值的。内边距（padding）可以用四个值声明一个元素的四个方向的内边距（paddings），这是一种 CSS 缩写属性。

properties.name: pointer-events
properties.syntax: auto | none | visiblePainted | visibleFill | visibleStroke | visible | painted | fill | stroke | all | inherit

values.name: auto
values.description: 与pointer-events属性未指定时的表现效果相同，对于 SVG 内容，该值与visiblePainted效果相同

values.name: none
values.description: 元素永远不会成为鼠标事件的target (en-US)。但是，当其后代元素的pointer-events属性指定其他值时，鼠标事件可以指向后代元素，在这种情况下，鼠标事件将在捕获或冒泡阶段触发父元素的事件侦听器。

values.name: all
values.description: SVG only (experimental for HTML). The element can only be the target of a pointer event when the pointer is over the interior (i.e., fill) or the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The values of the fill, stroke, and visibility properties do not affect event processing.

values.name: fill
values.description: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a pointer event when the pointer is over the interior (i.e., fill) of the element. The values of the fill and visibility properties do not affect event processing.

values.name: painted
values.description: SVG only (experimental for HTML). The element can only be the target of a pointer event when e.g. the mouse cursor is over the interior (i.e., 'fill') of the element and the fill property is set to a value other than none, or when the mouse cursor is over the perimeter (i.e., 'stroke') of the element and the stroke property is set to a value other than none. The value of the visibility property does not affect event processing.

values.name: stroke
values.description: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a pointer event when the pointer is over the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The values of the stroke and visibility properties do not affect event processing.

values.name: visible
values.description: SVG only (experimental for HTML). The element can be the target of a pointer event when the visibility property is set to visible and e.g. the mouse cursor is over either the interior (i.e., fill) or the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The values of the fill and stroke do not affect event processing.

values.name: visibleFill
values.description: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a pointer event when the visibility property is set to visible and when e.g. a mouse cursor is over the interior (i.e., fill) of the element. The value of the fill property does not affect event processing.

values.name: visiblePainted
values.description: SVG only (experimental for HTML). The element can only be the target of a pointer event when the visibility property is set to visible and e.g. when a mouse cursor is over the interior (i.e., 'fill') of the element and the fill property is set to a value other than none, or when a mouse cursor is over the perimeter (i.e., 'stroke') of the element and the stroke property is set to a value other than none.

values.name: visibleStroke
values.description: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a pointer event when the visibility property is set to visible and e.g. when the mouse cursor is over the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The value of the stroke property does not affect event processing.

properties.description: pointer-events CSS 属性指定在什么情况下 (如果有) 某个特定的图形元素可以成为鼠标事件的 target (en-US)。

properties.name: position

values.name: relative
values.description: 该关键字下，元素先放置在未添加定位时的位置，再在不改变页面布局的前提下调整元素位置（因此会在此元素未添加定位时所在位置留下空白）。position:relative 对 table-*-group, table-row, table-column, table-cell, table-caption 元素无效。

values.name: absolute
values.description: 元素会被移出正常文档流，并不为元素预留空间，通过指定元素相对于最近的非 static 定位祖先元素的偏移，来确定元素位置。绝对定位的元素可以设置外边距（margins），且不会与其他边距合并。

values.name: fixed
values.description: 元素会被移出正常文档流，并不为元素预留空间，而是通过指定元素相对于屏幕视口（viewport）的位置来指定元素位置。元素的位置在屏幕滚动时不会改变。打印时，元素会出现在的每页的固定位置。fixed 属性会创建新的层叠上下文。当元素祖先的 transform、perspective、filter 或 backdrop-filter 属性非 none 时，容器由视口改为该祖先。

values.name: static
values.description: 该关键字指定元素使用正常的布局行为，即元素在文档常规流中当前的布局位置。此时 top, right, bottom, left 和 z-index 属性无效。

values.name: sticky
values.description:
元素根据正常文档流进行定位，然后相对它的最近滚动祖先（nearest scrolling ancestor）和 containing block（最近块级祖先 nearest block-level ancestor），包括 table-related 元素，基于 top、right、bottom 和 left 的值进行偏移。偏移值不会影响任何其他元素的位置。
      该值总是创建一个新的层叠上下文（stacking context）。注意，一个 sticky 元素会“固定”在离它最近的一个拥有“滚动机制”的祖先上（当该祖先的 overflow 是 hidden、scroll、auto 或 overlay 时），即便这个祖先不是最近的真实可滚动祖先。这有效地抑制了任何“sticky”行为（详情见 Github issue on W3C CSSWG）。

values.name: -ms-page
values.description: The box's position is calculated according to the 'absolute' model.

values.name: -webkit-sticky
values.description: The box's position is calculated according to the normal flow. Then the box is offset relative to its flow root and containing block and in all cases, including table elements, does not affect the position of any following boxes.

properties.description: CSS position 属性用于指定一个元素在文档中的定位方式。top，right，bottom 和 left 属性则决定了该元素的最终位置。

properties.name: right

values.name: auto
values.description:
这个关键字表示：
    
      对于绝对定位元素，元素将忽略此属性而以 left 属性为准，如果此时设置 width: auto，将基于内容需要的宽度设置宽度；如果 left 也为 auto 的话，元素的水平位置就是它假如作为静态（即 static）元素时该在的位置。
      对于相对定位元素，元素相对正常位置的偏移量将基于 left 属性；如果 left 也为 auto 的话，元素将不会有偏移。

values.name: inherit
values.description: Specifies that the value is the same as the computed value from its parent element (which might not be its containing block). This computed value is then handled as if it were a <length>, <percentage>, or the auto keyword.

properties.description: right CSS 属性定义了定位元素的右外边距边界与其包含块右边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。

properties.name: text-align
properties.syntax: start | end | left | right | center | justify | match-parent

values.name: left
values.description: 行内内容向左侧边对齐。

values.name: center
values.description: 行内内容居中。

values.name: right
values.description: 行内内容向右侧边对齐。

values.name: end
values.description: The same as right if direction is left-to-right and left if direction is right-to-left.

values.name: justify
values.description: The inline contents are justified. Text should be spaced to line up its left and right edges to the left and right edges of the line box, except for the last line.

values.name: start
values.description: The same as left if direction is left-to-right and right if direction is right-to-left.

values.name: justify-all
values.description: Same as justify, but also forces the last line to be justified.

values.name: match-parent
values.description: Similar to inherit, but the values start and end are calculated according to the parent's direction and are replaced by the appropriate left or right value.

properties.description: text-align CSS 属性设置块元素或者单元格框的行内内容的水平对齐。这意味着其效果和 vertical-align 类似，但是是水平方向的。

properties.name: text-decoration

values.name: dashed
values.description: Produces a dashed line style.

values.name: dotted
values.description: Produces a dotted line.

values.name: double
values.description: Produces a double line.

values.name: line-through
values.description: Each line of text has a line through the middle.

values.name: none
values.description: Produces no line.

values.name: overline
values.description: Each line of text has a line above it.

values.name: solid
values.description: Produces a solid line.

values.name: underline
values.description: Each line of text is underlined.

values.name: wavy
values.description: Produces a wavy line.

values.name: text-decoration-line
values.description: 设置使用的装饰类型，例如 underline 或者 line-through。

values.name: text-decoration-color
values.description: 设置装饰的颜色。

values.name: text-decoration-style
values.description: 设置装饰的线条的颜色，例如 solid、wavy 或者 dashed。

values.name: text-decoration-thickness
values.description: 设置用于装饰的线条粗细。

properties.description: text-decoration 简写 CSS 属性设置文本上的装饰性线条的外观。它是 text-decoration-line、text-decoration-color、text-decoration-style 和较新的 text-decoration-thickness 属性的缩写。

properties.name: text-decoration-color
properties.description: CSS 属性 text-decoration-color 用于设置文本修饰线的颜色，文本修饰线是通过 text-decoration-line 属性指定的。

properties.name: text-decoration-line
properties.syntax: none | [ underline || overline || line-through || blink ] | spelling-error | grammar-error

values.name: underline
values.description: 在文本的下方有一条修饰线。

values.name: line-through
values.description: 有一条贯穿文本中间的修饰线。

values.name: overline
values.description: 在文本的上方有一条修饰线。

values.name: none
values.description: Produces no text decoration.

values.name: blink
values.description: The text blinks (alternates between visible and invisible). Conforming user agents may not blink the text. This value is deprecated in favor of CSS animations.

values.name:
blink 
  已弃用
values.description: 文本闪烁（文本交替处于显示与隐藏状态）。客户代理都一致没有实现文本闪烁效果。考虑到为了支持使用 CSS 动画，该值也不宜使用。

properties.description: CSS 属性 text-decoration-line 用于设置元素中的文本的修饰类型。当要设置多个线修饰属性时，用 text-decoration 简写属性会比分别写多个属性更方便。

properties.name: text-decoration-style

values.name: solid
values.description: Produces a solid line.

values.name: dashed
values.description: Produces a dashed line style.

values.name: dotted
values.description: Produces a dotted line.

values.name: wavy
values.description: Produces a wavy line.

values.name: double
values.description: Produces a double line.

values.name: none
values.description: Produces no line.

properties.description: CSS 属性 text-decoration-style 用于设置由 text-decoration-line 设定的线的样式。线的样式会应用到所有被 text-decoration-line 设定的线，不能为其中的每条线设置不同的样式。当要设置多个线修饰属性时，用 text-decoration 简写属性会比分别写多个属性更方便。

properties.name: text-decoration-thickness
properties.description: CSS 属性 text-decoration-thickness 用于设置元素中文本所使用的装饰线（如 line-through、underline 或 overline）的笔触厚度。

values.name: auto
values.description: 由浏览器为文本装饰线选择合适的厚度。

values.name: from-font
values.description: 如果字体文件中包含了首选的厚度值，则使用字体文件的厚度值。如果字体文件中没有包含首选的厚度值，则效果和设置为 auto 一样，由浏览器选择合适的厚度值。

properties.name: text-overflow

values.name: clip
values.description: 默认值。这个关键字会在内容区域的极限处截断文本，因此可能会在单词的中间发生截断。如果你的目标浏览器支持 text-overflow: ''，为了能在两个单词过渡处截断，你可以使用一个空字符串值（''）作为 text-overflow 属性的值。

values.name: ellipsis
values.description: 这个关键字会用一个省略号（'…'、U+2026 HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS）来表示被截断的文本。这个省略号被添加在内容区域中，因此会减少显示的文本。如果空间太小以至于连省略号都容纳不下，那么这个省略号也会被截断。

values.name: fade
values.description: This keyword clips the overflowing inline content and applies a fade-out effect near the edge of the line box with complete transparency at the edge.

values.name: fade( <length> | <percentage> )
values.description:
This function clips the overflowing inline content and applies a fade-out effect near the edge of the line box with complete transparency at the edge.
    The argument determines the distance over which the fade effect is applied. The <percentage> is resolved against the width of the line box. Values lower than 0 are clipped to 0. Values greater than the width of the line box are clipped to the width of the line box.

properties.description: text-overflow CSS 属性用于确定如何提示用户存在隐藏的溢出内容。其形式可以是裁剪、显示一个省略号（“…”）或显示一个自定义字符串。

properties.name: top

values.name: auto
values.description:
这个关键字表示：
    
      对于绝对定位元素，元素将忽略此属性已bottom属性为准，如果此时设置height: auto，将基于内容需要的高度设置高度；如果bottom也为auto的话，元素的垂直位置就是它假如作为静态 (即 static) 元素时该在的位置。
      对于相对定位元素，元素相对正常位置的偏移量将基于bottom属性；如果bottom也为auto的话，元素将不会有偏移。

values.name: inherit
values.description: Specifies that the value is the same as the computed value from its parent element (which might not be its containing block). This computed value is then handled as if it were a <length>, <percentage>, or the auto keyword.

properties.description: top样式属性定义了定位元素的上外边距边界与其包含块上边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。

properties.name: transform

values.name: rotate(<angle>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: rotateX(<angle>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: rotateY(<angle>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: rotateZ(<angle>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: scale(<number> <number>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: scaleX(<number>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: scaleY(<number>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: translate(<length/percentage> <length/percentage>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: translateX(<length/percentage>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: translateY(<length/percentage>)
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: matrix()
values.description: Specifies a 2D transformation in the form of a transformation matrix of six values. matrix(a,b,c,d,e,f) is equivalent to applying the transformation matrix [a b c d e f]

values.name: matrix3d()
values.description: Specifies a 3D transformation as a 4x4 homogeneous matrix of 16 values in column-major order.

values.name: none
values.description: Specifies that no transform should be applied.

values.name: perspective()
values.description: Specifies a perspective projection matrix.

values.name: rotate()
values.description: Specifies a 2D rotation by the angle specified in the parameter about the origin of the element, as defined by the transform-origin property.

values.name: rotate3d()
values.description: Specifies a clockwise 3D rotation by the angle specified in last parameter about the [x,y,z] direction vector described by the first 3 parameters.

values.name: rotateX('angle')
values.description: Specifies a clockwise rotation by the given angle about the X axis.

values.name: rotateY('angle')
values.description: Specifies a clockwise rotation by the given angle about the Y axis.

values.name: rotateZ('angle')
values.description: Specifies a clockwise rotation by the given angle about the Z axis.

values.name: scale()
values.description: Specifies a 2D scale operation by the [sx,sy] scaling vector described by the 2 parameters. If the second parameter is not provided, it is takes a value equal to the first.

values.name: scale3d()
values.description: Specifies a 3D scale operation by the [sx,sy,sz] scaling vector described by the 3 parameters.

values.name: scaleX()
values.description: Specifies a scale operation using the [sx,1] scaling vector, where sx is given as the parameter.

values.name: scaleY()
values.description: Specifies a scale operation using the [sy,1] scaling vector, where sy is given as the parameter.

values.name: scaleZ()
values.description: Specifies a scale operation using the [1,1,sz] scaling vector, where sz is given as the parameter.

values.name: skew()
values.description: Specifies a skew transformation along the X and Y axes. The first angle parameter specifies the skew on the X axis. The second angle parameter specifies the skew on the Y axis. If the second parameter is not given then a value of 0 is used for the Y angle (ie: no skew on the Y axis).

values.name: skewX()
values.description: Specifies a skew transformation along the X axis by the given angle.

values.name: skewY()
values.description: Specifies a skew transformation along the Y axis by the given angle.

values.name: translate()
values.description: Specifies a 2D translation by the vector [tx, ty], where tx is the first translation-value parameter and ty is the optional second translation-value parameter.

values.name: translate3d()
values.description: Specifies a 3D translation by the vector [tx,ty,tz], with tx, ty and tz being the first, second and third translation-value parameters respectively.

values.name: translateX()
values.description: Specifies a translation by the given amount in the X direction.

values.name: translateY()
values.description: Specifies a translation by the given amount in the Y direction.

values.name: translateZ()
values.description: Specifies a translation by the given amount in the Z direction. Note that percentage values are not allowed in the translateZ translation-value, and if present are evaluated as 0.

properties.description: CSS transform 属性允许你旋转，缩放，倾斜或平移给定元素。这是通过修改 CSS 视觉格式化模型的坐标空间来实现的。

values.name: all
values.description: Every property that is able to undergo a transition will do so.

properties.description: transition CSS 属性是 transition-property、transition-duration、transition-timing-function 和 transition-delay 的一个简写属性 (en-US)。

properties.name: transition-duration
properties.description: transition-duration 属性以秒或毫秒为单位指定过渡动画所需的时间。默认值为 0s，表示不出现过渡动画。

values.name: all

values.name: none

values.name: IDENT
values.description: 属性名称。由小写字母 a 到 z，数字 0 到 9，下划线（_）和破折号（-）。第一个非破折号字符不能是数字。同时，不能以两个破折号开头。

properties.description: transition-property 指定应用过渡属性的名称。

properties.name: transition-timing-function

values.name: ease
values.description: Equal to cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0), the default value, increases in velocity towards the middle of the transition, slowing back down at the end.

values.name: ease-in
values.description: Equal to cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 1.0, 1.0), starts off slowly, with the transition speed increasing until complete.

values.name: ease-out
values.description: Equal to cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.58, 1.0), starts transitioning quickly, slowing down as the transition continues.

values.name: ease-in-out
values.description: Equal to cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 0.58, 1.0), starts transitioning slowly, speeds up, and then slows down again.

values.name: linear
values.description: Equal to cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0), transitions at an even speed.

values.name: cubic-bezier
values.description: No description on MDN

values.name: cubic-bezier(p1, p2, p3, p4)
values.description: An author-defined cubic-Bezier curve, where the p1 and p3 values must be in the range of 0 to 1.

values.name: steps( n, <jumpterm>)
values.description:
Displays the transition along n stops along the transition, displaying each stop for equal lengths of time. For example, if n is 5, there are 5 steps. Whether the transition holds temporarily at 0%, 20%, 40%, 60% and 80%, on the 20%, 40%, 60%, 80% and 100%, or makes 5 stops between the 0% and 100% along the transition, or makes 5 stops including the 0% and 100% marks (on the 0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%) depends on which of the following jump terms is used:
        
          jump-start
          
            Denotes a left-continuous function, so that the first jump happens when the transition begins;
          
          jump-end
          
            Denotes a right-continuous function, so that the last jump happens when the animation ends;
          
          jump-none
          
            There is no jump on either end. Instead, holding at both the 0% mark and the 100% mark, each for 1/n of the duration
          
          jump-both
          
            Includes pauses at both the 0% and 100% marks, effectively adding a step during the transition time.
          
          start
          
            Same as jump-start.
          
          end
          
            Same as jump-end.

values.name: step-start
values.description: Equal to steps(1, jump-start)

values.name: step-end
values.description: Equal to steps(1, jump-end)

values.name: jump-start
values.description: Denotes a left-continuous function, so that the first jump happens when the transition begins;

values.name: jump-end
values.description: Denotes a right-continuous function, so that the last jump happens when the animation ends;

values.name: jump-none
values.description: There is no jump on either end. Instead, holding at both the 0% mark and the 100% mark, each for 1/n of the duration

values.name: jump-both
values.description: Includes pauses at both the 0% and 100% marks, effectively adding a step during the transition time.

values.name: start
values.description: Same as jump-start.

values.name: end
values.description: Same as jump-end.

properties.description: CSS 属性受到 transition effect的影响，会产生不断变化的中间值，而 CSS transition-timing-function 属性用来描述这个中间值是怎样计算的。实质上，通过这个函数会建立一条加速度曲线，因此在整个 transition 变化过程中，变化速度可以不断改变。

properties.name: visibility

values.name: visible
values.description: 元素框可见。

values.name: hidden
values.description: 元素框不可见（不绘制），但仍然影响常规的布局。如果将其子元素的 visibility 设置为 visible，则该子元素依然可见。元素无法获得焦点（例如通过 tab 索引进行键盘导航）。

values.name: collapse
values.description:
The collapse keyword has different effects for different elements:
    
      For <table> rows, columns, column groups, and row groups, the row(s) or column(s) are hidden and the space they would have occupied is removed (as if display: none were applied to the column/row of the table). However, the size of other rows and columns is still calculated as though the cells in the collapsed row(s) or column(s) are present. This value allows for the fast removal of a row or column from a table without forcing the recalculation of widths and heights for the entire table.
      Collapsed flex items and ruby annotations are hidden, and the space they would have occupied is removed.
      For other elements, collapse is treated the same as hidden.

properties.description: visibility CSS 属性显示或隐藏元素而不更改文档的布局。该属性还可以隐藏 <table> 中的行或列。

properties.name: white-space
properties.syntax: normal | pre | nowrap | pre-wrap | pre-line | break-spaces | [ <'white-space-collapse'> || <'text-wrap'> || <'white-space-trim'> ]

values.name: normal
values.description: 连续的空白符会被合并。源码中的换行符会被当作空白符来处理。并根据填充行框盒子的需要来换行。

values.name: nowrap
values.description: 和 normal 一样合并空白符，但阻止源码中的文本换行。

values.name: pre
values.description:
Sequences of white space are preserved. Lines are only broken at newline characters in the source and at
elements.

values.name: pre-wrap
values.description:
Sequences of white space are preserved. Lines are broken at newline characters, at
, and as necessary to fill line boxes.

values.name: pre-line
values.description:
Sequences of white space are collapsed. Lines are broken at newline characters, at
, and as necessary to fill line boxes.

values.name: break-spaces
values.description:
The behavior is identical to that of pre-wrap, except that:
    
      Any sequence of preserved white space always takes up space, including at the end of the line.
      A line-breaking opportunity exists after every preserved white space character, including between white space characters.
      Such preserved spaces take up space and do not hang, thus affecting the box's intrinsic sizes (min-content size and max-content size).

properties.description: CSS white-space 属性用于设置如何处理元素内的空白字符 (en-US)。

properties.name: width

values.name: auto
values.description: 浏览器将会为指定的元素计算并选择一个宽度。

values.name: fit-content
values.description:
取以下两种值中的较大值：
    
      固有的最小宽度
      固有首选宽度（max-content）和可用宽度（available）两者中的较小值
    
    可表示为：min(max-content, max(min-content, <length-percentage>))

values.name: max-content
values.description: 元素内容固有的（intrinsic）合适宽度。

values.name: min-content
values.description: 元素内容固有的最小宽度。

values.name: fit-content(<length-percentage>)
values.description: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, <length-percentage>)).

properties.description: width 属性用于设置元素的宽度。width 默认设置内容区域的宽度，但如果 box-sizing 属性被设置为 border-box，就转而设置边框区域的宽度。

properties.name: z-index
properties.description: z-index 属性设定了一个定位元素及其后代元素或 flex 项目的 z-order。当元素之间重叠的时候，z-index 较大的元素会覆盖较小的元素在上层进行显示。

values.name: auto
values.description: 盒子不会创建一个新的局部层叠上下文。盒子在当前层叠上下文的层叠等级是 0。

properties.name: -moz-animation

values.name: alternate
values.description: The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the normal direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a reverse direction.

values.name: alternate-reverse
values.description: The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the reverse direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a normal direction.

values.name: backwards
values.description: The beginning property value (as defined in the first @keyframes at-rule) is applied before the animation is displayed, during the period defined by 'animation-delay'.

values.name: both
values.description: Both forwards and backwards fill modes are applied.

values.name: forwards
values.description: The final property value (as defined in the last @keyframes at-rule) is maintained after the animation completes.

values.name: infinite
values.description: Causes the animation to repeat forever.

values.name: none
values.description: No animation is performed

values.name: normal
values.description: Normal playback.

values.name: reverse
values.description: All iterations of the animation are played in the reverse direction from the way they were specified.

properties.description: Shorthand property combines six of the animation properties into a single property.

properties.name: -moz-animation-delay
properties.description: Defines when the animation will start.

properties.name: -moz-animation-direction

values.name: alternate
values.description: The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the normal direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a reverse direction.

values.name: alternate-reverse
values.description: The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the reverse direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a normal direction.

values.name: normal
values.description: Normal playback.

values.name: reverse
values.description: All iterations of the animation are played in the reverse direction from the way they were specified.

properties.description: Defines whether or not the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles.

properties.name: -moz-animation-duration
properties.description: Defines the length of time that an animation takes to complete one cycle.

properties.name: -moz-animation-iteration-count

values.name: infinite
values.description: Causes the animation to repeat forever.

properties.description: Defines the number of times an animation cycle is played. The default value is one, meaning the animation will play from beginning to end once.

properties.name: -moz-animation-name

values.name: none
values.description: No animation is performed

properties.description: Defines a list of animations that apply. Each name is used to select the keyframe at-rule that provides the property values for the animation.

properties.name: -moz-animation-play-state

values.name: paused
values.description: A running animation will be paused.

values.name: running
values.description: Resume playback of a paused animation.

properties.description: Defines whether the animation is running or paused.

properties.name: -moz-animation-timing-function
properties.description: Describes how the animation will progress over one cycle of its duration. See the 'transition-timing-function'.

properties.description: Used in Gecko (Firefox) to display an element using a platform-native styling based on the operating system's theme.

properties.description: Determines whether or not the 'back' side of a transformed element is visible when facing the viewer. With an identity transform, the front side of an element faces the viewer.

properties.description: Determines the background painting area.

values.name: bounding-box
values.description: No description on MDN

values.description: No description on MDN
